titles.title: To authorize the issuance of a certificate of documentation with appropriate endorsement for the vessel, FIREBIRD, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee On Merchant Marine.

bill.summary: 7/26/1994--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation for a named vessel.
